Electric cars: Encourage the production and use of electric cars by offering incentives to manufacturers and consumers. This would help reduce emissions and improve air quality.
Carpooling app: Develop a carpooling app that connects drivers with passengers, making it easier for people to share rides and reduce the number of cars on the road.

Self-driving cars: Invest in the development of self-driving cars that can operate without human intervention. This would reduce the number of accidents caused by human error and improve overall traffic safety.
Public transportation improvements: Invest in improving public transportation options, such as buses and trains, to encourage people to use these options instead of their own cars.
Carpooling infrastructure: Develop infrastructure, such as dedicated carpool lanes and high-occupancy vehicle (HOV) lanes, to encourage carpooling and reduce traffic congestion.
